data.message: I've been a huge fan and loyal listener of yours for 10 years, but i seriously and respectful say to you Sir, you need to please stop these world tours. you have nowhere left to grow. you have peaked on the global fame scale. i ain't hating, but dude, what else could you possibly accomplish? but that's just my opinion. if you wanna continue your career, you can and will :)
